title: Weekly Review With Clay and Buck H3 - Sep 3 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review With Clay and Buck H3 - Sep 3 2022
description:
Florida Senator Marco Rubio joins Clay and Buck to discuss the Democrat raid on Mar-a-Lago, that his Democrat opponent is funded by out-of-state super PACs -- and what are the chances for the Miami Dolphins this season? Poll question: What is the best Eddie Murphy movie? FDA will likely authorize the Omicron vaccine soon based on data from 8 mice and no human clinical data available to the public. Why are so many liberals still scared of covid? Arizona gubernatorial candidate Kari Lake joins C&B to discuss the massive failure of Biden's border policies, her poised responses to liberal dark money attack ads and how Americans need to get out and vote. Why is California destroying itself? In New York City, Buck buys a bag of contraband plastic bags.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
